entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
